data.persona: I am one of a number of local children.  I love to play pranks on other children in the street.  My mother sends me every day to buy bread for my family.
data.description:
You are in the The Troll's Lair.
Covered with rotting meat from nearby wildlife, the Troll's lair reeks of death.  If the stench alone wasn't enough to scare off an unfortunate travelers who stumbled upon it, the bones of unlucky spelunkers would be.  The Troll places his spoils near the numerous stalagmites on the damp cave wall, his red eyes patiently scanning the dark cave interior for anything that may disturb his isolation.
There's a stalagmite, a bone, an a dim lamp, a giant firepit, and a rotting meat here.
The a turtle can't escape fast enough to avoid being eaten and the knight are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe and a robe.

The Troll places his spoils near the numerous stalagmites on the damp cave wall, his red eyes patiently scanning the dark cave interior for anything that may disturb his isolation.",
            "extra_desc": "Used as a story to scare local children, the Troll is very reclusive, and prefers a life of solitude in his lair.  While a few brave knights have tried to root him out from his home within the cave, none have ever escaped.  Now, most let him be, happy to grant him lease within the darkness underground. data.short_motivation: I need to choke the troll to death.
data.mid_motivation: I need to make it out of this lair alive.
data.long_motivation: I need to get back to the kingdom and warn everyone about the troll, while telling the story of the knight who gave his life to save mine.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the forest to take a nice stroll.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go an interesting looking cave to explore, where I am captured by the troll and dragged to his lair.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the troll into his lair. A knight appears and tries to save me, but the troll is too fast and too strong. The knight is killed, but while the troll is hunched over, I see a chance for my own survival.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the belt and wrap it around the troll's neck. I pull as hard as I can until the troll's neck snaps.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the kingdom to warn the people about the troll's lair. There may be other trolls there waiting to strike unsuspecting humans.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: wear the knight's belt in honor of the fallen knight.
